SELECT MOVIE_INDEX,MOVIE_TITLE,MOVIE_DIRECTOR,MOVIE_ACTOR,MOVIE_GENRE,MOVIE_LIMIT_AGE,MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME,MOVIE_OPEN_DATE,MOVIE_END_DATE,MOVIE_POSTER,MOVIE_INFO,MOVIE_TAGS,MOVIE_TYPE,MOVIE_STATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_LIKE B WHERE B.MOVIE_INDEX = A.MOVIE_INDEX) AS 'MOVIE_LIKE', (SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(REVIEW_RATING),0),2) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW C WHERE C.MOVIE_INDEX = A.MOVIE_INDEX ) AS 'MOVIE_RATING', (SELECT ROUND(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_SHOWING B INNER JOIN MOVIE_RESERV C ON B.SHOWING_INDEX = C.SHOWING_INDEX WHERE YEARWEEK(B.SHOW_DATE) = YEARWEEK(NOW())) * 100 ,1) FROM MOVIE_SHOWING B INNER JOIN MOVIE_RESERV C ON B.SHOWING_INDEX = C.SHOWING_INDEX WHERE YEARWEEK(B.SHOW_DATE) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) AND B.MOVIE_INDEX = A.MOVIE_INDEX GROUP BY B.MOVIE_INDEX) AS 'MOVIE_RESERVRATING' FROM MOVIE A
WHERE MOVIE_STATE = 1 AND MOVIE_OPEN_DATE > NOW() AND MOVIE_END_DATE >= NOW() WHERE MOVIE_STATE = 1 AND MOVIE_OPEN_DATE <= NOW() AND MOVIE_END_DATE >= NOW() AND MOVIE_TYPE = 1 WHERE MOVIE_STATE = 1 AND MOVIE_OPEN_DATE <= NOW() AND MOVIE_END_DATE >= NOW()
ORDER BY
MOVIE_INDEX ASC MOVIE_INDEX DESC MOVIE_RATING DESC MOVIE_OPEN_DATE ASC MOVIE_RESERVRATING DESC
